SEARCH
Package org.example.model.deck

Class Card

java.lang.Object
org.example.model.deck.Card
public class Card extends Object
Class representing a Card to abstract the four card types of the game.

  • Constructor Details

    • Card

      public Card(int id, Type type, CardRes cardres, CardRes[] requireGold, Integer points, GoldenPoint goldenPoint, ObjectivePoints objectivePoints, CardPosition cardposition, SideCard side)
      Constructs a Card with the specified properties.
      Parameters:
      id - the card ID
      type - the type of the card
      cardres - the card resource
      requireGold - array of requirements for gold cards
      points - points given by the card
      goldenPoint - golden points of the card
      objectivePoints - objective points of the card
      cardposition - the position of the card
      side - the side card

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the object. This method constructs a string that includes the type of the object, card resources, objective points, the side of the card, and details of the front and back corners if available.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      a string representation of the object.
